title: Wanna transfer NA account to JP but already have one in JP server
body: I want to transfer my NA account to JP server, however, I already created a account which using the same e-mail address,name and password in JP server. What is gonna happen if I transfer my account? Is it going to cover the one in JP server or what?

replies.body: I just realized that the account in JP has the same account name and password......which account will show up when I log in?
